/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling cityscape, bathed in the soft glow of a clear day. The sun, high in the sky, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars moving along the road, their colors muted under the sun's glare. Buildings of various sizes and shapes line the street, their facades reflecting the sunlight. Among these structures, a tall tower stands out, its height dwarfing the surrounding buildings. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking upwards, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of clouds, adding to the serene atmosphere of the scene.
